Sandevistan.name: Sandevistan
Sandevistan.description: Increases the speed of neural connections to the point where the user's perception of time is slowed down.

Kerenzikov.name: Kerenzikov
Kerenzikov.description: Allows the user to aim and shoot while dodging.

Optical Camo.name: Optical Camo
Optical Camo.description: Allows the user to become invisible for a short period of time.

Gorilla Arms.name: Gorilla Arms
Gorilla Arms.description: Allows the user to rip doors off their hinges and deal massive damage to enemies.

Braindance.name: Braindance
Braindance.description: Allows the user to experience the recorded memories of others.

Anxiety.name: Anxiety
Anxiety.description: A mental health disorder characterized by feelings of worry, anxiety, or fear that are strong enough to interfere with one's daily activities.

Depression.name: Depression
Depression.description: A mental health disorder characterized by persistently depressed mood or loss of interest in activities, causing significant impairment in daily life.

Bipolar Disorder.name: Bipolar Disorder
Bipolar Disorder.description: A mental health disorder characterized by extreme mood swings that include emotional highs (mania or hypomania) and lows (depression).

Schizophrenia.name: Schizophrenia
Schizophrenia.description: A mental health disorder characterized by delusions, hallucinations, disorganized speech, and/or diminished, inappropriate emotional expression.

Paranoia.name: Paranoia
Paranoia.description: A mental health disorder characterized by excessive fear and anxiety.

Diabetes.name: Diabetes
Diabetes.description: A disease in which the body's ability to produce or respond to the hormone insulin is impaired, resulting in abnormal metabolism of carbohydrates and elevated levels of glucose in the blood and urine.

Hypertension.name: Hypertension
Hypertension.description: A condition in which the force of the blood against the artery walls is too high.

Heart Disease.name: Heart Disease
Heart Disease.description: A range of conditions that affect your heart.

Cancer.name: Cancer
Cancer.description: A disease caused by an uncontrolled division of abnormal cells in a part of the body.

Asthma.name: Asthma
Asthma.description: A condition in which a person's airways become inflamed, narrow and swell, and produce extra mucus, which makes it difficult to breathe.

Epilepsy.name: Epilepsy
Epilepsy.description: A neurological disorder marked by sudden recurrent episodes of sensory disturbance, loss of consciousness, or convulsions, associated with abnormal electrical activity in the brain.
